name: Menu Stacking
pages: Items with this feature:$(li)$(l:mechanics/inv_access)Quick Inventory Access items$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/any_access)Quick Access items$(/l)$(br2)When exiting GUI, it will return to the previous GUI if opened in accessible GUI. Press Shift + Esc to close all menu.

This feature is for items which can be opened in other menu, such as backpack and dimensional storage. When you open them, the previous menu will be cached and restored when you close the new menu, just like the back button. Thus we have a way to exit all menus at once, like the close button.
